run_neo4j[source]

run_neo4j(version='4.3.2', run_on_set_ports=False, **kwargs)

Spin up a new neo4j in a docker instance if one is not already running. Set the ichordb default driver to point to this test database.

start_neo4j[source]

start_neo4j(*args, **kwargs)

Convenience function to Runs a neo4j container. Sets the default driver to use that container Returns the container and the driver objects
